description: Harukawa Tomomi is a employed maidservant and childhood friend of Kuraki Suzuna. Despite her noticeably sizable bust, Tomomi is a very slow, gentle, soft-spoken girl who often meticulously strives to please those being served; particularly Suzuna, who ironically is her foil. She is the only bespectacled member of the household and the most bisexually promiscuous. Tomomi is a niece to Harukawa Gohei and granddaughter to Ippei.
name: Harukawa Tomomi
